games.title: Benny Says
games.description: A simon says style game where you need to match the growing sequence every round

games.title: Benny's Baseball
games.description: A full baseball simluation game with no reaction needed, simply make choices and play a full season of baseball.

games.title: Benny's Basketball Shooter
games.description: A fun basketball shooting game with special bonus mode to try to get the highest score possible.

games.title: Benny's Bowling
games.description: A fun simple bowling game with physics and realistic sound effects. Choose your a ball style or fun background theme.

games.title: Benny's Bug Blaster
games.description: A tower defense style game where you squash bugs with your boot and have to buy items to keep your defenses up against the bugs.

games.title: Benny's Chess and Checkers
games.description: Play classic Chess or Checkers against the computer or with a friend!

games.title: Benny's Matchy Match
games.description: Previously called concentration. A fun matching game with competitive modes and cooperative play. This comes with an editor app to make your own games!

games.title: Benny's Mini Golf
games.description: A top-down minigolf game you can play with up to four people. The balls have collision on so have fun smacking eachothers balls around! This game has a level editor to create your own golf courses.

games.title: Benny's P3GL Game
games.description: A peggle style game with a campaign/level editor built in. Have fun making different kinds of peg blasting games!

games.title: Benny's Tic Tac Toe
games.description: Play tic tac toe against the computer or against your friends.

games.title: Benny's Word Jumble
games.description: A word puzzle game where you have to rearrange the word to advance.

games.title: Benny's Trivia Master
games.description: A trivia game engine that lets you build your own trivia games! Add pictures and videos to make it more fun!
